body.name: Mydethun 3D Moon Lamp with 5.9 Inch Wooden Base - Valentine's Gift LED Night Light, Mood Lighting with Touch Control Brightness for Home Décor, Bedroom, Gifts for Women Kids Birthday - White & Yellow
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 7 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 3D Printed Moon Lamp: Create a relaxing atmosphere at home with the hyper-realistic moon lamp from Mydethun. Its moon-like surface is designed using 3D printed technology and is based on astronomical data provided by NASA.

Perfect Home Decor Gift: The cute moon decor lamp is a charming gift for birthdays, baby showers, Valentine's Day, Christmas, New Year, Halloween, Home, Bedroom, Kids, Women, and Couples. It is made by PLA materials and comes in a simple and beautiful box packaging

Lifelike Moon on a Wooden Base: The lamp rests on a graceful wooden base and adds an aesthetic vibe to your room decor. The bottom of the night light is thoughtfully designed to retain the shape of the moon as much as possible.

Dual-Color Lamp with Adjustable Brightness: The LED moon lamp allows you to easily change the color of the light from lunar white to warm yellow with a simple tap on the mini touch switch at the bottom. You can also long tap to adjust the brightness and create a cozy to cool ambience

Rechargeable and Long Battery Life: The 5.9-inch rechargeable lamp has an 8-hour battery life and can be charged quickly within 2 hours. It can stand for the whole night to do meditation and sleep training

What's included in the package? Our Mydethun Moon Lamp includes 1 moon lamp, 1 wooden base, 1 USB power chord and 1 instruction manual. Why do we need a moon lamp? The Mydethun Moon Lamp is made by the 3D printing technology. The authentic appearance is very similar to the moon, which can inspire users' creativity and peace of mind. It can act as home decor, gifting, sleep training and other features. How long will the moon lamp last? The small desk lamp for living room has an 8-hour battery life (depends on brightness) and can be charged quickly within 2 hours, so it can last for the whole sleep. What is the material of the moon lamp? The Mydethun Lamp for Kids is made by the certified MSDS UN38.3 and the food-grade PLA raw material to build. What can I do if the moon lamp is broken? Mydethun values everyone of her beloved customers. Therefore, Mydethun will provide an one-year support to all the customers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! The PERFECT Gift for the Moon Enthusiast
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. What can I say? This 3-D printed orb is a stunning representation of our nearest celestial neighbor! The MOON!It’s complete in its detail and accurately reflects the asteroid and meteor impacts of the ages.I was impressed with its remote control capabilities and the ambiance the orb delivers.With a full charge this glowing orb stays illuminated all night and then some.It’s illumination features are extensive with full color delivery along the whole visible light spectrum; various lighting intensity levels and programmed transitions / operation make it infinitely configurable to compliment any decor or state of mind.It’s the perfect gift for yourself, your favorite space enthusiast, your friendly neighborhood witch, or those lovers of the bright orb itself.I gave this unique treasure as a gift to my favorite witch and lover of the celestial body we call the moon.A practicing Wiccan, she was born under the light of the full moon and she finds the moon as nothing else than magical She was thrilled with the gift for the holiday season.I liked this glowing piece of the heavens that I ordered two more - one for my office and one for my study. They add a quiet intrigue to both spaces and always get compliments from business associates and guests.Magic is truly in the air anytime the orb glows in any room that it makes home!Put it in your basket, you’ll be pleased that you did. Or do like me, buy three and share a glimpse of the solar system we call home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this little moon! There are two settings, white light and soft light, and I always go for the soft light because it looks more moon-like to me. I got the smallest size for my remote workspace because I love the little hand-shaped stand. I was really excited that it’s rechargeable because I don’t have many electrical outlets in that corner. I haven’t timed it but the charge is pretty impressive! Adds the perfect amount of ambient light! I have an untrained eye, but the craters look pretty realistic. I brag that I have captured the moon. Vector could never!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for "moon lovers"
reviews.reviewText: This moon is a great accent piece to any room or office. It is a nice size, and gives off a soothing light. Not to bright, so it is also a great night light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's small but bright. Its so cute and fits in so perfectly. The 2 settings are nice. I prefer the dimmer warmer light. My only complaint is the battery life. I feel like it's only a few hours🫤.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my daughter for Christmas. Very nice quality & perfect for a small light in a room. Love that it has the 2 shades of white (I didn’t want all the different colors in other brands). It resembles the moon perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moon Lamp is a must have. Ambient lighting FTW
reviews.reviewText: The Mydethun Moon Lamp adds a captivating touch to any space with its realistic lunar surface and soft glow. Despite its compact size, it creates a soothing atmosphere and serves as an aesthetically pleasing decor piece. Purchased for a friend and she was stoked on it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The moon lamp looks beautiful when lit, but it runs on a rechargeable battery that doesn't last very long at all. It turns itself off after 2 or 3 hours, and the battery dies on the 3rd lighting. I'd intended to use it as a night light and decoration on my book shelf, but it isn't worth charging it constantly for only a few hours of light.It's still pretty though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This moon light is so unique> My granddaughter just loves it.
reviews.reviewText: Everything about this item we liked. Gives just enough light in her room to be comfortable. Very unique and flattering.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Stellar Addition to Any Room!
reviews.reviewText: The Moon Lamp has truly transformed my living space into a celestial haven. This enchanting lamp is not just a source of light; it's a work of art that brings the serene beauty of the moon right into my home.Crafted with incredible attention to detail, the Moon Lamp replicates the lunar surface with stunning accuracy. The texture and contours create a mesmerizing play of light and shadows, evoking a sense of tranquility and wonder. The lamp offers a warm, soothing glow that adds a touch of magic to any room.One of the standout features is the adjustable brightness, allowing me to create the perfect ambiance for any occasion. Whether I'm unwinding with a book or setting a romantic mood, the Moon Lamp provides the ideal lighting solution.The rechargeable battery ensures convenience, and the touch control feature adds a modern and user-friendly touch to this celestial masterpiece. The lamp's durable build and eco-friendly materials further contribute to its overall appeal.In summary, the Moon Lamp is more than just a lighting accessory; it's a conversation starter and a piece of celestial beauty that captivates anyone who enters the room. If you're looking to add a touch of enchantment to your living space, the Moon Lamp is an absolute must-have. Highly recommended for those who appreciate the intersection of art and functionality!
La luz no es blanca ni cálida, es RGB y cambia de colores sin ningún tipo de control o switch para elegir el color. La calidad es aceptable pero no era el producto que esperaba.
He comprado el de la mano y es me ha encantado. Es ideal para hacer un regalo. El embalaje y la tarjeta para poner un mensaje personalizado.Muy recomendado!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was hesitant it would look tacky at first but it's amazing, different colour selections and settings with dimmer. Lovley gift, lightweight and rechargeable. Alot of reviews on here saying it looks awful off... I would disagree but of course it looks more amazing on. Also saw alot of comments about people receiving battery operated ones... No idea why this would be the case, states it's rechargeable, comes with a usb cable.
